attributes.action: Stop the government from sending depleted uranium shells to Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
As reported by the UN this type of weapon is believed to cause cancer and birth defects..

How can a country which prides itself on the value of human life make such a reckless decision.. 

It is shocking when viewed alongside the Americans refusal to send such shells and is fundamentally perverse..

Indeed, we suggest Russia would potentially make use of a dirty bomb, yet we are providing Putin with a route to do this by bring the first to use weapons with nuclear materials/waste..

This is morally and ethically reprehensible..

I am horrified that the British press has down played this by only providing limited headlines and simply spending valuable page coverage with Boris Johnson..
attributes.background: As the subject heading states we would like the government to not send send depleted uranium shells.. why would we want to cause further damage on the Ukrainian population.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635335
